thag19.1:34.2: vupasamo dukhassa → vūpasamo dukkhassa (bj, sya1ed, sya2ed)
thag19.1:35.1: Taṇhā avijjā → taṇhaṃ virajjañca (sya1ed, sya2ed); taṇhaṃ avijjañca (pts1ed)
thag19.1:37.2: rājadasī → rājādisī (sya1ed, sya2ed, mr); rājadisī (pts1ed, pts2ed)
thag19.1:39.2: cāraṇikaṃva → vāraṇikaṃva (sya1ed, sya2ed, pts1ed) | dassayaṃ → dussahaṃ (sya1ed, sya2ed); dassahaṃ (pts1ed)
thag19.1:44.1: Dhitipparaṃ → dhī dhī paraṃ (sya1ed, sya2ed, pts1ed)
thag19.1:54.2: pāvusaabbhamāliniṃ → pāvisi abbhamālinaṃ (sya1ed, sya2ed, pts1ed, pts2ed); ... māliṃ
thag19.1:54.3: ramissaṃ → ramissasi (sya1ed, sya2ed, pts1ed, pts2ed, mr)
